page.title: 13Life-styles
page.content: The majority of people who live in Repton or Newton Solney travel to Burton to{shop}because it is the nearest major town. The majority of the villagers are {retired}and so the occupations are gardening, reading, completing cross-words puzzles, sewing and cooking. Not many people{dine}in Hotels or restaurants,this pleasure is reserved for special occasions . However local people still go out to Pubs to socialise. Most people bought their{clothes} saying that they did not have time to make them. Most people listened to{'classical {music'}and only occasionally 'pop'. {Gambling}proved to be a rare pursuit although about half put money of the Football Pools.
